content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you get scheduled. Can I please have your name to get started?
Hi, it's Mark. I'm actually needing some AC work but honestly I'm swamped this month. I don't think I'll have time to schedule anything right now.
No problem at all, Mark! If you get some free time next month or your schedule changes, just let us know. We're here whenever you need us. Is there anything else I can help with today?
No, that's all. I'll reach out when things slow down. Thanks.
reason: Customer too busy to schedule this month
